text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
We have a day off, so I'm<n>chaperoning Fine Motion on a
day trip<n>out to the mountains.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Inhale... Exhale... Ah, the air is sofresh out here in the forest! It remindsme of mornings in the garden back home.

text_block_list.name: Captain's Voice over Phone
text_block_list.text:
...That will be all, Trainer. Please<n>remain vigilant, and ensure
Her<n>Highness's safety.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Hehehe, thank you again for your<n>time, Trainer. They
certainly wouldn't<n>have let me come this far out alone.
choice_data_list: Just happy to—uh, what are we here to do, anyways?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Oh, that's an excellent question.<n>Hehehe, you see...

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
...I haven't planned anything! I just<n>thought we'd have
ourselves a nice,<n>normal stroll in the great outdoors.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Yes, although, um... You never know<n>what surprises could
be waiting out<n>there.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I smell mischief brewing, but I let it<n>slide for now, and we set
off on the<n>path.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
...Ah, that was delicious! Not to toot<n>my own horn, but the
cold noodles I<n>packed came out perfectly.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
And made it so far, too. No more<n>city—just the creek
gurgling, birds<n>singing, bugs chirping... It feels like<n>we
wandered into a fairytale world.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
You know, it reminds me of a story I<n>read when I was little.
The hero saves<n>the princess, and they're running<n>through
the woods together...

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
And then, the dragon catches up to<n>steal the princess back.
It actually<n>attacks them in a remote clearing just<n>like this.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
...Hehe. It feels like the dragon could<n>pop out any second,
doesn't it?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Oh, it's just a "what-if," silly. But if a<n>dragon really did jump
out... You<n>would fight to protect me... Right?
choice_data_list: That's a big "if," but sure. I would protect you.
That's a big "if," but sure. I would protect you.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Really?! I'm flattered! Aw, now Ialmost wish a dragon wouldappear.
GrooooOOOOOOAR!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Ah! Trainer, look! There's something<n>in the river!

text_block_list.name: Dragon
text_block_list.text: Graaaaawr!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
From the water emerges... a<n>tyrannosaurus rex costume
with big<n>flabby wings for arms.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: A dragon! Oh no! Don't come any<n>closer!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
While my mind struggles for a<n>comeback, the... dragon(?)
crosses its<n>arms, striking a pose straight out of a<n>monster
movie.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Aaah! Whatever am I to do? The evil<n>dragon is going to eat
me!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Oh, if only—if only a hero would slay<n>the dragon and rescue
me from my<n>plight...
choice_data_list: ...All right, all RIGHT! Leave it to me!

text_block_list.name: Dragon
text_block_list.text: Rooooar!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: My hero! May courage guide your<n>hand!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I wrestle the dragon for minutes,<n>getting pushed back and
forth<n>aimlessly until finally...

text_block_list.name: Dragon
text_block_list.text: Groooar! I have fallen!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Thank goodness! You were so<n>dashing, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
But we've got no time to celebrate.<n>The dragon gets back
on its feet and<n>then... removes its head.

text_block_list.name: Security Captain
text_block_list.text: Hehehe. Congratulations.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Hehe. Three, two, one!

text_block_list.name: Fine & Captain
text_block_list.text: Surpriiiise!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I am shocked and flabbergasted by<n>this entirely unexpected
turn of<n>events.
choice_data_list: ...Why are you trying to surprise me?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Hehehe... Remember the other day,<n>when we helped take
that kitty home?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
I kept thinking to myself what a nice<n>surprise it was, so I
decided to plan<n>another, just for you!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: ...How was it? Did you like it?
choice_data_list:
It definitely caught me off guard, but... yeah, I
did enjoy it.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: I'm so glad! All that rehearsal was<n>worth it, I see. ♪

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
I'm also happy you kept your<n>promise—that you'd protect
me from<n>the dragon.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: ...Hehe. Thank you.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The un-dragon-ified Captain joins us<n>for the rest of the
hike. We enjoy the<n>view from the mountain's peak, then<n>
leisurely make our way home.

text_block_list.name: Owner of Ramen Rampage
text_block_list.text: Oh, welcome back, lassie. Can I<n>getcha the usual?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Yes, for three, please.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Whew... After all that, it feels nice to<n>be back. Thank you
both for such an<n>exciting outing.
choice_data_list:
The wrestling match wore me out more than I
thought.

The wrestling match wore me out more than I
thought.

text_block_list.name: Security Captain
text_block_list.text:
Heh. I've got quite a lot of practice<n>being the dragon. Her
Highness even<n>made me a medal for it when she<n>was
little.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Haha, I remember that! The medal for<n>draconic excellence,
right? I made it<n>with flowers, twigs, and clovers.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Now that you mention it, I wonder<n>what award I should give
our dashing<n>hero. How about... "the dragon<n>slayer's
medallion"?
choice_data_list: I-it'd be an honor. I think?
I-it'd be an honor. I think?

text_block_list.name: Security Captain
text_block_list.text:
Congratulations, Dragon Slayer. Just<n>so you know, though,
I'm also a<n>decorated actor of witches and<n>fortresses.
You've not bested me yet.

text_block_list.name: Owner of Ramen Rampage
text_block_list.text:
Order up. Three bowls of savory shio<n>ramen, with extra
toppings.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
...Eh?! The savory shio ramen<n>doesn't come with menma or
corn,<n>and I didn't say anything. How did<n>you know?

text_block_list.name: Owner of Ramen Rampage
text_block_list.text:
I remember my regulars' usual<n>orders—toppings and all. The
extras<n>are on the house, so you three enjoy<n>'em.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: We absolutely will. Thank you so<n>much!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
The "usual," though... I suppose<n>there's a lot of charm in the
ordinary<n>everyday routine, too.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Hehe. It's odd to think that I'm a<n>"regular" here now. Eating
ramen and<n>chatting with everyone has become<n>such a
normal part of my life.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: You know, I think maybe, just<n>maybe...

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
No, it's nothing. I was just struck by<n>what a lovely day it's
been.
